channel.description: Recent content in Cnv on Inti Pedroso Rovira

item.title: CNV Caller
item.description: This project aims to develop a CNV caller for NGS short read sequencing data on using a Hierarchical Dirichlet Process & HMM technology. Code lives here https://bitbucket.org/intipedroso/cnv-hdp-hmm
